solution_line_template: The mother plant produces {baby_plants_per_production} baby plants {productions_per_year} times a year so it produces {baby_plants_per_production}*{productions_per_year} = <<{baby_plants_per_production}*{productions_per_year}={plants_per_year}>>{plants_per_year} plants a year

It produces {plants_per_year} plants a year so after {num_years} years it will produce {plants_per_year}*{num_years} = <<{plants_per_year}*{num_years}={total_baby_plants}>>{total_baby_plants} baby plants
